name: My Brother Loves Guitar Solos 2018
description:
just walk around and listen to guitar solos

Guitar solos from:
"Really Love" by D'Angelo and The Vanguard*
"1488" by JPEGMAFIA*
"Melting" by King Gizzard and the Lizard Wizard*
"We're Where We Were" by The Voidz*
"My Mathematical Mind" by Spoon
"Left Side Clouded" by The Sea and Cake
"Frisbee" by Ringo Deathstarr

*Submitted by Trouv

Using DungeonScript by Farbs

Here is a webpage of more guitar solo-related stuff I have done for my brother's birthday in the past few years.
